Reviews.Title: Everything You Need!
Reviews.Author: James M. Loveday "Mike Loveday"
Reviews.Content: Functionality, price, performance...It's all here in this package!  Novice photographers won't be overwhelmed by the features on this camera package and those with a bit more "savy" won't feel like they are working "cheap".  This unit feels good and comfortable in the hand and the optics are really nice.  The results are photos you'll be proud to share.

Reviews.Title: !!!!GREAT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mysticblur
Reviews.Content: I'm no expert, but this camera is sweet! It has all kinds of whistles and bells, including adjustable shutter speed and light settings. It's definitely produces high quality pictures, and with the set, you will be sure you have everything you need to run the camera and take it with you where you need to go. I was checking around in my local stores for a camera similar to this with the same features, and you can't touch any of them for this price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife as a christmas gift and she loves it. The only thing that i have a complaint about is that it didn't come with the instructional manual. But no worries, I found it online. So hopefully i will be taking better photos once we figure it out.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Product
Reviews.Author: MegJennings
Reviews.Content: I know people who have spent thousands on cameras and extra equipment and I believe it to be non sense. I got this package and it has all the features the cannon and Nikon cameras do with the exception of the hot shoe for the detachable flash. I am a photographer, I do wedding's, family portraits, on location shoots etc. And this camera can stand up to any high priced camera any day of the week. I did have to purchase a pop up flash defuser from B&H; Photo to tame the bright flash but I have nothing bad to say. GE did great when they made this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This is a very good camera for the price.  Everything in the bundle works great and is very useful.Pros:- takes great photos-lots of scene settings-nice feel, easy to hold-large LCD screenCons:-when you zoom really far, it becomes a little grainy-when you are trying to take up-close, or zoomed in pics it can be very hard to focus the camera-the video quality is fine, however the microphone barely picks up any noise.  For example, I took a video of my brother and he was 3-4 ft. away and you could barely hear him on the video.  ( However for me, this is not really a big deal because I bought the camera for pics)-4 AA batteries

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: dog pen
Reviews.Content: This has got to be one of the best hidden values around.  This camera has some of the best pictures i've seen. There's about 400 options once you get it up and running, have no clue what the hell i'm doing, but if you find the active or automatic setting, and make sure the flash is up no matter what (obviously not outside looking at the sun, for example), you will be amazed.  Bought this as my fiance's x-mas gift, and was a hit.  To give you an idea, a guy I work with took the same route and bought his wife a camera for x-mas.  The only difference between our 16mp cameras is that his lenses come off, has complete manual override, etc. (SLR camera vs. my SLR-esque camera).  Oh, and by the way, his camera costs $1200 and came with classes for instruction on how to use the thing.  To date, his wife only has used it in the classes.  And to date, i've made a house payment, bought the camera, and took a vacation with the camera for the same money.  Think about it.

Reviews.Title: digital SLR
Reviews.Author: Michael Borsack
Reviews.Content: handy all in one purchase as gift for my wife. She wanted to learn about SLR photography. I feel that I still shoot better pictures w/ a point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: worth much more
Reviews.Author: novice
Reviews.Content: I did my research before buying the amazing GE X-500 16mp-It is so very easy to use, just click the shutter. Video was just as easy and great quality. The camera does it all. The kit included 4 batteries that recharge at home or in the car-useful.Great little tripod, 8g, case fits all items just right. You'll have to spend much more to equal this product.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: drb58
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a simple , inexpensive digital camera when I found this one.  Great pictures and a wide range of picture taking options plus video.  Great deal found on Amazon.  Glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: b.martin
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a decent camera for a long time. I have had this camera for less then 6 hours but so far it is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy!
Reviews.Author: readit
Reviews.Content: So far...so good!  Good bargain, works well, lots of features, easy to use, good weight, nice to have the tripod and the rechargable batteries along with the other goodies!  Glad I bought it!!!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: mysh75
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera and set.  It was easy to set up and the software was simple to install.

Reviews.Title: Very happy about product.
Reviews.Author: Laurie Nicholson
Reviews.Content: I would recommend.The camera works amazingly! If your having second thoughts about the purchase you're making a mistake. I think you'll love it just as much as I do!The quality of the photos is very very good. I would not have changed a thing.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Clara L. Steward
Reviews.Content: This was a great package and more than I expected when I ordered it. All the little extras was great

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Deli
Reviews.Content: So I pretty much love this camera! You get so many accessories with it also! It is a great camera and I've taken it with me to all our trips! I absolutely love it!

Reviews.Title: best advertised and delivered product!!
Reviews.Author: Me'a
Reviews.Content: thought the order was too good to be true but it wasnt...received everything in a timely manner and everything works and is all inclusive...great!!!!!!!!!! perfect service

Reviews.Title: Good camera!
Reviews.Author: Court84
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to practice photography. So far, so good. I really enjoy the product and everything was as promised.The only "problem" per say, is some pics are a bit blurry on certain settings. Other than that, all is great.I think for the price, this is a good camera for any "practicing" photographers out there to play around with, and get some good shots!

Reviews.Title: camera and accessories
Reviews.Author: jlmrrt
Reviews.Content: Love tthis camera....it takes great pictures in any light setting..... Wonderful bargain for the money..... could not have aked for anything more....

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it
Reviews.Author: James Schliemann
Reviews.Content: Camera was received 3 days after ordering. Great service, outstanding value. This is a winner. Camera has most of the bells and whistles for the price. Very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera !
Reviews.Author: Shianna Turner
Reviews.Content: The quality of this camera is great !But, the night time mode is a bit grainy but I still love it.It takes flawless photos.It came with a 4 inch mini tripod, cleaning kit, neck strap, and the lens cover.For the price I payed, I'd say it was a wonderful deal.I will deff. buy from this company in the future !5/5 stars !

Reviews.Title: best modelling accessory
Reviews.Author: Peta
Reviews.Content: this has made my modelling career even more better than ever now i have my own camera and it's perfect

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: JM
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother in law who is a picture nut!!  She loves everything about this camera and says it has many hi end features.  She does go thru alot of batteries she states but other than that she recommends it,

Reviews.Title: Great gift for teen
Reviews.Author: cc
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my teenager and its easy to use and shoots beautiful pictures.  The seller had an amazing price and was very knowledgeable and helpful.  Fast shipping and great product/add ons for price.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love it
Reviews.Author: Zekesgirl
Reviews.Content: I love my camera, it takes beautiful pictures at a fraction of the cost of similar cameras.  I still need to learn all the bells and whistles but even just regular aim and shoot pictures come out great.

Reviews.Title: AWFUL
Reviews.Author: Kate Kolb
Reviews.Content: If I could give this camera negative stars, I would. The screen display on the back is severely discolored to the point that you can't even tell what the composition of the picture is supposed to be. that's really the only way to take a picture, too. There's no good setting for just looking through the viewfinder. the image on the screen is awful. it's blurry and grainy and would be impossible to tell if you had a good shot. even set on the "motion" setting, it takes shaky pictures at best. There is a delay as well between when you depress the button and when it snaps the picture. In a word---JUNK.I sent it back and got a refund. what a waste!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Ann L M
Reviews.Content: I Love it...I'm not a camera fan but with this bundle is wonderful. I was force to learn how to use it and my daughter uses it as well.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Ruben Gallardo
Reviews.Content: Esta cámara es una de las mejores cámara que tenido la resolución es muy buena y en Zoom aun mejor.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for beginner
Reviews.Author: Sandy Dickerson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera and my daughter uses it to take photos of her puppies for display on the internet, etc.  She seems to love it.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: kenneth
Reviews.Content: For the money the best camera UV ever seen.. By a long shot. Takes better pictures than a lot of $500 cameras I've. It is actually my 2ND one I've purchased. I lost the first in a divorce.

Reviews.Title: Great Condition
Reviews.Author: Jenni Eubank
Reviews.Content: this is a great camera.  It doesn't do very well at action shots, but is great for family pictures, etc.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Carol Arellano "gram mom"
Reviews.Content: I had to send this back, sorry it did not work out for use, I am sure it was a good camera.

Reviews.Title: excellent choice
Reviews.Author: poppadanny
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my teenage daughter.  Just got back from vacation and the camera was a huge hit!!!

Reviews.Title: Takes good pictures but sucks up the batteries
Reviews.Author: kathy schuck
Reviews.Content: The camera was for my teenage daughter who is into photography.  While it takes good pictures, the re-chargeable batteries that came with it take at least a day to recharge and then are exhausted after a few uses.  We tried buying new batteries and they were exhausted after an hour or so of use.  I wouldn't buy this based on the fact that it is unreliable if you want to use the camera all day long.

Reviews.Title: takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: Clothilda Smith
Reviews.Content: I use my pro x500 for every occasion now. i orginally got it so i can take pictures of my little girls modeling and dance classes but i cant seem to put it down

Reviews.Title: Awesome Deal
Reviews.Author: James Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Excellent package deal. Very easy to use. This was a gift for the whole family. We now can enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Amy Schuelke
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas as she is getting into photography. After seeing the pics she was taking.... I was tempted to go by myself one! Great camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: Christine Bartlett
Reviews.Content: this takes beautiful photos and does many things on its own with the various built in settings.  Extra rechargeable batteries though were not recharging so could not use them.  Not sure if it is the charger that came with them not working as it should or just batteries.  I highly recommend this camera for its abilities and reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUNDLE, good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Christian_uy
Reviews.Content: We all know this is no 5 star camera but it is very good for the price it sells and for most who  will just point and shoot it is more than enough.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Adriana
Reviews.Content: It take nice pictures, i like it. zoom its awsome. and al stuff that camerea brings for the price its a good deal. But didn't send me the mamory card. But it's ok.

Reviews.Title: I Like it
Reviews.Author: Raquel Cordoba S,
Reviews.Content: I have not used yet because it's a Christmas open until December 25, as soon as you open and notice something different if they are communicated

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: joeman55
Reviews.Content: This is a good deal for this camera looked around couldn't find a better deal. Would buy this again. THANKS VERY MUCH!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kev
Reviews.Content: This little camera is shocking pretty darn good. You should definitely snatch this up if you are looking for a low cost family camera, but be warned it is not a video camera and wasn't made to be one so don't use it as one even though you have the ability because the microphone sucks on it. It takes excellent photo's though.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: samantha wilkins
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for myself for Christmas.  It arrived 4 days after I placed the order, which was a week earlier than projected!!  I will purchase from this seller again!!  Camera takes great pics, but I do need to learn a little more about it (easy enough to use though)!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Bill Nottingham
Reviews.Content: I got the item quickly and it was exactly as described. It's always great getting what was advertised at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Kirkpatrick
Reviews.Content: My daughter has taken an interest in photography. So I wanted to get her a starter set up, but I did not want to spend a fortune in case she does not like it. For the price, I believe I got a great deal on this package. I received the full package withing 3 days and everything was packaged and new. Now I want one.

Reviews.Title: As described, fits the bill!
Reviews.Author: Hazel Gibson "Hazy"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my granddaughter to use in a photography class in school. It was suggested by the teacher, so I assumed is must be a good one.

Reviews.Title: I was a gift
Reviews.Author: George E. Newcomer
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my stepdaughter as a gift, (her other one was stolen). So far she has lots of praise for it.

Reviews.Title: Has features that cameras costing $300 to $400 more have.
Reviews.Author: G. M. Whittenberg "csdiwhitt"
Reviews.Content: The only thing that this camera doesn't have that the more expensive cameras have is that you can't change the lens.  My kit came with 16GB memory.  I must have caught them switching over from the 8GB memory.

Reviews.Title: For the Money, Mighty Hard to Beat
Reviews.Author: Joe Senter
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that offered the ergonomic design of my venerable FujiFilm S3100, but with updated features such as video mode with sound, higher power zoom --- and the big one --- ability to take indoor photos without having to blind people and wash out the scenery with the flash.My eight-year-old FujiFilm camera took great photos in sunlight, but indoors  was virtually unusable in available light because the ISO was only 100 or 200.But the GEX500 filled that bill very nicely, allowing me to take indoor pictures even in lower light, and still taking great photos outdoors also.The only disappointment was that the X500 doesn't accept add-on optics such as polarizing or skylight filters to protect the factory lens, like my old camera does. So if the factory lens gets a scratch, one will have to find an entire new lens assembly on ebay (for the time being they're available), and hope someone locally knows how to install it.Besides that, however, the GE Power Pro X500 is hard to beat for the money --- ESPECIALLY when buy the packaged kit with the soft case, memory card, tripod and cleaning stuff --- yes, mighty hard to beat indeed!

Reviews.Title: Built for NASA  and me!
Reviews.Author: James White
Reviews.Content: You'll be hard-pressed to find a more inept picture-taker than me.  But since using this camera,  it's easy to keep that a secret. Everything's there for this  non-photographer including unimaginable technological aids such as a "smile detection shutter" that automatically releases when my portrait subject's smile appears -- now, I seldom miss those great shots that real photographers instinctively capture. In fact, this camera seems to have most of the features found on other more pricey high-reputation cameras EXCEPT they're all point-and-shoot based  --  and why not!  A bit of homework discovered that GE photo imagining systems are well-respected by NASA and the military.

Reviews.Title: Easy Operation
Reviews.Author: sportsbookguy
Reviews.Content: I'm not very fancy when it comes to picture taking, so I was looking for a camera that is easy to use and takes quality pictures. I am very satisfied. This camera appears to have enough bells and whistles to appeal to those who want them, but they are not of primary importance to me. For my purposes, the camera itself is a five star, but since this review covers the entire bundle, I drop it to a four because I like to have an owners manual in book form so I don't have to refer to the CD and print my own pages.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Style and Quality for the Price!
Reviews.Author: S. Mazhar
Reviews.Content: My son received this camera as a gift to use for his photography class in high school. He was thrilled to bits immediately upon examining this fine equipment. This camera has all the features and quality of a high end Nikon or Cannon. It has good weight. It does not feel light and cheap. It is designed beautifully to be held in the hand. It makes photography so much fun and the pictures come out great. It is definitely worth the buy and will not disappoint!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: ModifiedZombie
Reviews.Content: By far the best camera I've used. The close ups are wonderful and all the settings that come with it are nice. I also loved the battery inclusion for the camera, because they last through hundreds of photos!

Reviews.Title: GE Camera bought at Amazon
Reviews.Author: BJ
Reviews.Content: The camera takes good enough pictures, however I don't like the date stamp.  It sometimes is disappears or is so small its hard to read. Also batteries don't last very long.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money!
Reviews.Author: Lisa A. Adamson
Reviews.Content: The second time we used this camera and tried to view the photos we took, the whole camera shut down and not one button on it worked. We put new batteries in it and it did the same thing. I contacted the seller, "Beach Camera" in Edison New Jersey, and he told me because we bought it over six months ago we would have to contact GE to fix or replace it. The phone number he gave me was disconnected. When I contacted him the second time, he gave me GE's website which said absolutely nothing about fixing, repairing, or replacing GE products. Thank goodness I saved the box this camera came in or I would have lost $155 from a camera that was trash. After contacting GE, I have sent the camera back and I am now waiting for a response to what is wrong with it.

Reviews.Title: I may change this if they replace with one that works
Reviews.Author: Christopher "Mac" MacDonald
Reviews.Content: I really did my research and this looked to be a great deal But when it came it would not focus and the white balance id not work. I am no novice. Had my own darkroom and have used seven different digital cameras since I was 13 (thats like 40 years). I had a friend also try. Finally I just wanted to return the unit and get a replacement that had been tested. They insisted I send ALL of the package back. I could not find part. I sent what I could again with the offer of just swapping the defective camera for the same model which works. We will see. If they do it I will change this review and note that they were very response. If not. I will add more notes. I have spent at least 6 hours on this problem and postage to send back.

Reviews.Title: dissappointed
Reviews.Author: charsity
Reviews.Content: I ORDERED THIS PRODUCT BECAUSE I THOUGHT IT WAS A GOOD DEAL BUT WHEN I GOT THE CAMERA I WAS DISSAPOINTED BECAUSE CAMERA WASN'T WORKING. WHEN TURNING OFF THE CAMERA IT WASN'T COMING OFF AND THE FLASH WASN'T COMING OFF AND THE LENS WASN'T EVEN GOING BACK IN. I AM SO DISSAPPPOINTED BECAUSE I WAS SO EXCITED TO GET THIS PRODUCT FOR SUCH AH GOOD PRICES

Reviews.Title: BUENA COMPRA
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: BUENA CAMARA, BUENA RELACION PRECIO VALOR. EXCELENTE COMBO INCLUYE TODO LO NECESARIO PARA EL USUARIO INICIAL DE FOTOGRAFIA DIGITAL. COMPRA TOTALMENTE RECOMENDADA

Reviews.Title: BAD
Reviews.Author: ZANA
Reviews.Content: The item was damage and not working.General Electric Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 8GB Camera Bundle (Black) by General Electric

ProductInfo.Name: General Electric Power Pro X500-BK 16 MP with 8GB Camera Bundle (Black)
